meanings.sent1: The store had superabundances of fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: She was overwhelmed by the superabundances of gifts on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The picnic had so many sandwiches, it was a superabundances feast!
meanings.sent4: The garden was a superabundances of colorful flowers, like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with a superabundances of gold coins, sparkling in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The state of being more than enough.
meanings.sent1: The superabundances of food at the party ensured everyone went home full.
meanings.sent2: Her kindness towards others showed a superabundances of compassion.
meanings.sent3: The overflowing fountain was a superabundances of water, splashing joyfully.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed through the room, a superabundances of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The library shelves held a superabundances of books, waiting to be explored.
